sentences.sContent: A group of Australian sea lions relax and frolic in a sea grass meadow near Little Hopkins Island South Australia.
sentences.sContent_eng: A group of Australian sea lions relax and frolic in a sea grass meadow near Little Hopkins Island South Australia.
sentences.sCn: 一群澳大利亚海狮在海草草甸中休憩、嬉戏，是在澳大利亚南部的小霍普金斯岛附近拍的。

sentences.sContent: New ideas of festivity or frolic, theatricals or other entertainments, found in him a ready patron, and with his help would flourish and find fruition.
sentences.sContent_eng: New ideas of festivity or frolic, theatricals or other entertainments, found in him a ready patron, and with his help would flourish and find fruition.
sentences.sCn: 他喜欢支持各种与节庆或嬉戏、戏剧或其它娱乐有关的新思想。 这类思想在他的帮助下就会开花结果。

sentences.sContent: Boys as young as four or five tell more jokes, frolic and clown about while girls tend to be the ones doing the laughing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Boys as young as four or five tell more jokes, frolic and clown about while girls tend to be the ones doing the laughing.
sentences.sCn: 男孩子在四五岁的时候就能够讲很多笑话，嬉戏或者扮小丑，女孩子这个时候通常还只会笑。

trans.tranOther: a fun enjoyable game or activity
to play in an active happy way
